Articles.Content:
Hi,

I saw the new air intakes and the first thing I thought about was: don't they look like the ones from the MIG-31 ? Well, there we go, 1 hour later and here it is. Turns like a potato at supersonic speeds but flies "ok".

Some pics: [http://imgur.com/a/oUjiN](http://imgur.com/a/oUjiN)

Download: [http://bit.ly/1zjBTkx](http://bit.ly/1zjBTkx) [mediafire]

I highly suggest flying it with the physics arrows displayed ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) :D

If it turns like a potato then it's a real MiG-31 ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Wasn't the airframe limited to 3.5G ?

Good job on the replica !
Why is the atmo so foggy?

> 
> Why is the atmo so foggy?

It's a mod called scatterer, still WIP but IMO it looks quite good already (I like it at least) ! It simulates atmospheric scattering
